name: legcom_respawn_01
text: I do not take defeat lightly.
text_simple: i do not take defeat lightly

name: legcom_respawn_02
text: If I cannot outsmart them, I will outfight them.
text_simple: if i cannot outsmart them i will outfight them

text: If I cannot outfight them, I will outsmart them.
text_simple: if i cannot outfight them i will outsmart them

name: legcom_respawn_04
text: I underestimated them. It will not happen again.

name: legcom_respawn_10
text: I crossed the world to win this day. I will not fail now.
text_simple: i crossed the world to win this day i will not fail now

name: legcom_respawn_11
text: I am not so easily put down.

name: legcom_respawn_12
text: Retreat? Hah! Never heard of it.
